name: Arghround!
description:
Arghround!

Just a simple Pirate game made for KenneyJam 2021.

How to Play

I recomment to download the game instead of playing on a browser, otherwise some visual effects do not work.

Press ENTER to start the game.

Use WASD to control the ship, use QE to rotate the ground. Click on the pirates, enemy ship and towers to shoot them with your cannon.

Your main goal is to take down The Flying Dutchman. To take down The Flying Dutchman, you'll need to shoot it 3 times. Each time The Flying Dutchman takes a hit, it will hide itself for a while.

You are also targeted by random pirates around the world, take them down before they can take down you.

Good luck!
